subdisciplines.name: Geochemistry
subdisciplines.description: The study of the chemical composition and changes in Earth's structure and materials.

subdisciplines.name: Geophysics
subdisciplines.description: The study of physical properties of the Earth and its environment to understand the structure and processes of the earth.

subdisciplines.name: Sedimentology
subdisciplines.description: The study of sedimentary rocks, their processes of formation and their relationship to Earth history.

subdisciplines.name: Petrology
subdisciplines.description: The study of rocks, their origin and formation, mineralogy and how they relate to geologic processes.

subdisciplines.name: Stratigraphy
subdisciplines.description: The study of rock layers, their composition and their relationship to geologic time.
